promoDesc.title: Promotion
promoDesc.content: Additional 5% off Advisory Fees (public rate: 0.5% to 0.6% p.a.) until 31 Dec 2021.

promoDesc.title: Terms and conditions
promoDesc.content:
- For Cash and SRS portfolios only.
- Not applicable for WiseIncome and WiseSaver portfolios.
- Promotions on advisory fees are not stackable, applying a new advisory fee promo code will overwrite your existing benefits.

promoDesc.title: Promotion
promoDesc.content: Enjoy 0% Advisory Fees on WiseIncome until 31 Dec 2021.

promoDesc.title: Terms and conditions
promoDesc.content:
- For WiseIncome Portfolio investments in Cash and/or SRS.
- Not applicable for WiseSaver portfolio investments.
- Promo code valid for use from 1 Apr to 30 Jun 2021.
- Valid for all NTUC members (both black and silver card holders).
- Promotions on advisory fees are not stackable, applying a new advisory fee promo code will overwrite your existing benefits.

promoDesc.title: Remarks
promoDesc.content: Fees will be updated once it has been processed.

promoDesc.title: Promotion
promoDesc.content: Enjoy 0% Advisory Fees on WiseIncome as long as you remain an employee of Fullerton.

promoDesc.title: Terms and conditions
promoDesc.content:
- For employees of Fullerton Fund Management only. Please set up your MoneyOwl account using your corporate email address.
- For WiseIncome Portfolio investments in Cash and/or SRS.
- Not applicable for WiseSaver & Dimensional portfolio investments.

promoDesc.title: Remarks
promoDesc.content: Fees will be updated once it has been processed.

promoDesc.title: Promotion
promoDesc.content: Test email validation for malinator.

promoDesc.title: How to redeem
promoDesc.content:
- Top up a minimum amount of $10,000
- Only applicable to Cash and SRS funded portfolios
- Not applicable to WiseSaver portfolio
- Applying on an existing promo will overwrite fees and changes are non-reversible.

promoDesc.title: How to receive
promoDesc.content: Promotion fees will be reflected in your fees once the processing has been completed.
